definition.text: Each Node is of a certain type. It's type defines what the Node can be used for, the Node Menu, to which other nodes it can attach to, and may other properties that are dependent on the Node Type At the Design Space, the type of the node is displayed below the Node Icon.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode.
